name: Carnival of the Lost
description:
Game Description

Carnival of the Lost is a story about a young boy and his twin sister who go exploring in the woods near their house on the night before Halloween. The two have always been inseparable, so when Vince returns from the woods by himself, everyone knows something is seriously wrong.

No matter how hard they searched, they could never find any traces of Lili or the carnival that Vince is convinced made her vanish.

The loss of a sibling is hard in itself, but as a twin, Vince felt like he lost a part of himself. He could never forgive himself or the evil carnival that took his sister away from him. 

A decade passes after her disappearance, when Vince decides it's time to go get some answers that he's had for those long 10 years.

Content Warnings

This game includes detailed descriptions of death and violence. Mild blood warning.
